title: InitP (Method)
text:
METHOD InitP : BOOL
Initializes the queue with user-defined buffers.
See also method
SMC_GSentenceQueue.SetPointers
.

rows.Name: prgName
rows.Comment:
The name of the program or subprogram.
This is usually the full path of the CNC file.
E.g. for the file with full path â/some/dir/name.cncâ.

rows:
Size of the sentence buffer in bytes.  Must hold at least 2
sentences.

Size of the G-Word buffer in bytes.  Must hold at least 64
gwords.
Pointer to the expression token buffer

Size of the expression token buffer in bytes.
Must hold at least 128 expressions.
Pointer to the additional data buffer

Size of the additional data buffer in bytes.
Must hold at least 256 bytes.
